mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSITIONS (POSITIONS_SEQ, POSITIONS_NAME, POSITIONS_REGDATE) VALUES('POSITIONS_' || TO_CHAR(POSITIONS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 'FM000'),#{positions_name}, SYSTIMESTAMP)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM POSITIONS p WHERE 1=1
AND POSITIONS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{positions_name} || '%'
AND POSITIONS_REGDATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start_regdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{end_regdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
